scripts.start: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common REQUEST_LOG_FILE=debug.log DEBUG=notes:* nodemon app.mjs
scripts.fs-start: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common REQUEST_LOG_FILE=debug.log NOTES_MODEL=fs DEBUG=notes:* nodemon app.mjs
scripts.level-start: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common REQUEST_LOG_FILE=debug.log NOTES_MODEL=level DEBUG=notes:* nodemon app.mjs
scripts.sqlite3-start: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common REQUEST_LOG_FILE=debug.log NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 DEBUG=notes:* nodemon app.mjs
scripts.mongodb-start: cross-env MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=notesdb NOTES_MODEL=mongodb DEBUG=notes:* nodemon app.mjs
scripts.fs-server1: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=fs DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3001 node app.mjs
scripts.sqlite3-server1: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3001 nodemon app.mjs
scripts.sequelize-server1: cross-env SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-mysql.yaml NOTES_MODEL=sequelize DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3001 nodemon app.mjs
scripts.mongodb-server1: cross-env MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=notesdb NOTES_MODEL=mongodb DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3001 nodemon app.mjs
scripts.fs-server2: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=fs NOTES_FS_DIR=notes DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3002 node app.mjs
scripts.sqlite3-server2: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3002 nodemon app.mjs
scripts.sequelize-server2: cross-env SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-mysql.yaml NOTES_MODEL=sequelize DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3002 nodemon app.mjs
scripts.sequelize-psql-server2: cross-env SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-psql.yaml NOTES_MODEL=sequelize DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3002 nodemon app.mjs
scripts.mongodb-server2: cross-env MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=notesdb NOTES_MODEL=mongodb DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3002 nodemon app.mjs
